Table of Contents

Interface INotificationLogRepository

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Repositories
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Repository interface for managing notification audit logs. Provides methods for tracking, querying, and analyzing notification delivery and interactions.

public interface INotificationLogRepository : IRepository<NotificationLog>
Inherited Members
IRepository<NotificationLog>.GetAllAsync(CancellationToken)

IRepository<NotificationLog>.CountWhereAsync(Expression<Func<NotificationLog, bool>>, CancellationToken)

IRepository<NotificationLog>.DeleteAsync(NotificationLog, CancellationToken)
IRepository<NotificationLog>.DeleteByIdAsync(int, CancellationToken)
IRepository<NotificationLog>.InsertOrUpdateAsync(NotificationLog, CancellationToken)
IRepository<NotificationLog>.InsertAllAsync(IEnumerable<NotificationLog>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<NotificationLog>.UpdateAllAsync(IEnumerable<NotificationLog>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<NotificationLog>.DeleteAllAsync(CancellationToken)

Remarks

This interface defines the contract for data access operations related to NotificationLog entities. It emphasizes efficient data retrieval and modification, suitable for low-resource environments by promoting server-side filtering and explicit control over data loading.

Methods

CleanupOldLogsAsync(int, CancellationToken)

Cleans up old notification logs that are beyond the specified retention period.

Task<int> CleanupOldLogsAsync(int retentionDays = 30, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

retentionDays int

The number of days to retain logs. Default is 30 days.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<int>

The number of logs deleted during the cleanup operation.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if retentionDays is negative.

GetByArticleIdAsync(int, CancellationToken)

Retrieves notification logs for a specific article.

Task<List<NotificationLog>> GetByArticleIdAsync(int articleId, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

articleId int

The unique identifier of the article.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<List<NotificationLog>>

List of notification logs associated with the specified article.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if articleId is less than or equal to 0.

GetByDateRangeAsync(DateTime, DateTime, CancellationToken)

Retrieves notification logs within a specific date range.

Task<List<NotificationLog>> GetByDateRangeAsync(DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

startDate DateTime

The start date (inclusive) of the desired range.

endDate DateTime

The end date (inclusive) of the desired range.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<List<NotificationLog>>

List of notification logs that fall within the specified date range.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if startDate is greater than endDate.

Calculates the click-through rate (CTR) for notifications.

Parameters

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<double>

The click-through rate as a percentage (double), or 0.0 if no notifications exist.

GetPendingNotificationsAsync(CancellationToken)

Cancellation token.

GetRecentAsync(int, CancellationToken)

Retrieves a limited number of the most recent notification logs.

Task<List<NotificationLog>> GetRecentAsync(int limit = 50, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

limit int

The maximum number of recent logs to return. Default is 50.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<List<NotificationLog>>

List of recent notification logs, ordered by creation date descending.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if limit is less than or equal to 0.

Returns

RecordActionAsync(int, NotificationAction, CancellationToken)

Records a user action on a notification (click, dismiss, etc.).

Task<int> RecordActionAsync(int notificationId, NotificationAction action, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

notificationId int

The unique identifier of the notification log to update.

action NotificationAction

The NotificationAction performed by the user.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<int>

The number of rows affected, typically 1 if successful.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if notificationId is less than or equal to 0.
